page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SUSAN
page.content: I get up at 7.00 a.m., get washed and dressed and wait for breakfast because my mum takes my dad to work.My dad works for British Telecom and my mum is a Home Help. When she comes back we have toast whilst watching Breakfast Time television. Later I get ready for school.St.Stephen's School starts at 9.00a.m. We have our assembly of hymn singing and prayers and then go into class to work. Playtime is at 10.30 a.m. sometimes we talk or play under-arm tig where somebody is 'on' if they 'tig' you. Then you put your arms up and somebody goes under your arms to free you.We go back into school at 10.45 a.m. and work until dinner time. After dinner we go out to play and come in at 1.30 p.m. School ends at 4.00 p.m. When I get home I call for a friend.I come in at 8.00 p.m. and go to bed at 9.30 p.m
